signin.intro: TradeNow is an online bartering system, allowing people to exchange their used stuffs with others. Our principle is to enable people to get their wanted stuffs without currency, just like ancient store age!
signin.collection2: Upload your own collections of stuffs that you want to trade away
signin.collaboration2: Pick one stuff from other peoples collections, and let them choose from your collection
signin.exchange2: >Now both of you have choose favorite items from each others, you guys can trade now!
signin.support2: Whenever you need help, we are always here!
signin.locbase2: You can always find the nearest people to trade with
signin.userfriendly2: We have been trying to bring you the best user experience
signin.allinone2: User collaboration, delivery method negotiation can be done in one single transaction page
signin.safe2: We ensure the secruity of your data in the cloud
signin.waitstill: Wait, still not sure what we do? Have a look at following tutorial
signin.stepone: Step One. Upload your items, and browse others
signin.steponee: Every user have their own public backlog of stuffs that they want to throw away, and other people can view them, and decide to trade with their own stuff
signin.steptwo: Step Two - Find what you can offer, and negotiate with others
signin.steptwoo: Looks like you have choose to own that Xbox One! Now you can choose one of your belongings from your own backlog, and negotiate with the Xbox owner within our site
signin.stepthree: Step Three - Negotiation about the delivery method on site
signin.stepthreee: Ok! Now you have had the deal to trade Xbox One with your cool TV. Next, you can choose either delivery in-person or use commertial delivery/mailing services. Our system will keep track of every trade history and their user-defined delivery methods. Therefore don't worry if you feel been spamed. We have your back covered.
signin.existing: Login in with your existing account
signin.sendemail: We will send you an email containing password reset information

profile.welcome: Welcome! Please first complete your profile
